nodes.text: Corsairian Crescent was an area of the Karthakk system under control of the Canyon Corsairs during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It was rumored that the Corsairs would clamor into their own dogfights with the locals, hoping to collect loot as the spoils of war. Otherwise nondescript, the Corsairian Crescent proved to be a territory in which only the brave traveled. The region was home a space station patrolled by a number of Corsair Man O'wars.

Corsairian Crescent was a location in Jump to Lightspeed, the 2004 expansion pack for the massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
